title: Nachtmystium - Silencing Machine (Limited Edition) mp3  320k ak6
description:
Nachtmystium - Silencing Machine (Limited Edition) mp3  320k ak6103-Silencing Machine is the sixth full-length album by black metal band Nachtmystium. It was released via Century Media Records in the United States on July 30, 2012.

Limited edition includes an additional bonus track "Ashes to Ashes". This track is a rerecorded version of the same track on the Nachtmystium's 2004 album Demise.
